name: Ghostie: The Ghost Hunter
description:
Game is made for UNOG Fall Jam 2021. 

Ghostie, our cat hunts down ghosts in her house. There are 5 ghosts in the house, found them and scare them away.

Hope you have fun while playing!

GameJam Team

Muhammed Kayacan, Aleyna Dila Erer, Sudenas Turkmen, Tunahan Yanardag, Ali Yigit Yilmaz,  Suleyman Akbulut
